project.title: Healeying Flanders
project.bio: Healeying Flanders is an organization that organizes a tour for vintage cars every year.
project.briefing: To give even more the feeling of a classic car rally race, they asked me to design a rally plate.
project.goal:
First I did some research of how a classic rally plate looks like, etc. Then I illustrated some plates and illustrated an illustration of the car that the client gave me as reference. 
&nbsp
Now every year, *not 2020 due to Covid 19*,  the client comes back to ask the same design but in another color. And every year they bring me a rally plate.
